properties.body:
CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT MARTIN TO COLOMBIA.
DNC 14, DNC 16.
EIGHT METER S/V TRINAVIS, WHITE HULL,
ONE PERSON ON BOARD, OVERDUE
MARIGOT (18-04N 063-04W) TO
BARRANQUILLA (10-57N 074-47W). VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
